turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, can you order a coffee for me at Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing, from which Starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on 1600 Kennedy, in Tampa

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, what would you like to get?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was thinking about golden latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, in what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Large

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like it hot or iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hot surely.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have anything besides regular and soy?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, they also have coconut and almond milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's try coconut this time.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, do you want sugar or honey.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Honey would be great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, anything else you want to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, this would be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I've placed your order at the Starbucks on Kennedy St, it will be ready withing 15 min, and the receipt will be texted to you, anything else I can help you with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Not now, thank you for your help, bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome, bye.
